note.p: Physician and botanist. President of the Edinburgh Royal Medical Society, 1856–7. BSc, London University, 1860; MB 1862. Lecturer in botany, Surgeons’ Hall, Edinburgh, 1861. Professor of botany and materia medica, Royal Agricultural College, Cirencester, 1863. Registered as a medical practitioner in Melbourne, Australia, in 1866; house surgeon, Melbourne Benevolent Asylum, 1866–7. Resident surgeon, Yarra Bend Asylum, Victoria, Australia, 1867–72; acting surgeon, Ararat Lunatic Asylum, 1872.
Argus (Melbourne), 23 May 1866, p. 5, and 8 April 1872, p. 5
Census returns of Scotland 1861 (The National Archives of Scotland: Kilbride 1/6)
West Yorkshire, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1910 Ancestry.com, accessed 3 August 2018
